content: dalek towel crochet pattern exterminate spills with these decorative and functional kitchen towels difficulty advanced beginner techniques colorwork magic_ring crochet in the round lily sugar ncream with color a in red blueberry sunshine and white and size approximately 11 in 28 color b in black cm wide by 18 in 48 cm long when hanging chain chain materials slip_stitch slip_stitch size 5 5 mm us i-9 crochet hook single_crochet single_crochet lily sugar ncream or another 100% cotton worsted weight yarn double_crochet double_crochet 160 yards for color a decrease draw up a loop in each of the next two stitches yarn over and draw 50 yards for color b through all three loops on hook yarn needle for weaving in ends bobble with color b yarn over insert hook into next stitch and pull up a loop yarn over and pull through two loops on hook four times switch to color a yarn over and pull through all five loops on hook ©2014 critical stitch dalek towel crochet pattern each bobble row is followed by a row of scin pattern notes color a carry color b along the top of the previous row and crochet over it then drop it to change colors work stitch to last two loops on hook then at the end of the row this leaves it in the right switch to new color and draw place to pick up at the start of the next through both loops on hook to bobble row complete the stitch begin the instructions next stitch with the new color with color a ch36 row 1 single_crochet in second chfrom hook and each chain across 35 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 turn scin each st 35 single_crochet row 3-4 with color b ch1 turn scin each st 35 single_crochet in bobble row which use both colors carry the unused color row 5-6 with color a ch1 turn scin each st along the top of the previous row 35 single_crochet and crochet over it row 7 chain 3 does not count as double_crochet turn double_crochet in next two sts bobble *double_crochet in next 4 sts bobble* repeat from * five times double_crochet in last 2 sts 28 double_crochet and 7 bobbles row 8 chain 1 turn scin each st 35 single_crochet row 9 chain 3 does not count as double_crochet turn double_crochet in each st 35 double_crochet row 10 chain 1 turn scin each st 35 single_crochet don t cut color b until after row 11-26 repeat row 7-10 four times completing row 39 carry the row 27 repeat row 7 last bobble row do not unused strand up the side of the carry color b back to opposite side of work work when not in use instead carry it up along the side of work row 28-29 with color a ch1 turn scin each st 35 single_crochet row 30-31 with color b ch1 turn scin each st 35 single_crochet row 32-39 repeat row 28-31 twice fasten off color b ©2014 critical
